properties.name: environment
properties.description: Name of the development/test environment to show on UI

properties.name: files.storage
properties.description: Relative path to root of indexed file storage

properties.name: files.filesystem
properties.description: Relative path to unsorted file archive root

properties.name: deploy.tomcat.path
properties.description: Application path, where the application will be deployed

properties.name: logs.path
properties.description: Relative path where application logs are stored
